_comment: AD743 - Ultra-Low Noise BiFET Operational Amplifier
description: AD743 Ultra-Low Noise BiFET Operational Amplifier configured as LNA
_comment_G: Gain, dB (configured via external resistors for 20 dB gain)
_comment_NF: Noise Figure, dB (calculated from 2.9 nV/√Hz input noise at 10 kHz)
_comment_BW_LNA: Bandwidth, Hz (10 MHz typical for AD743)
_comment_Z_in: Input impedance, Ohms (very high for BiFET op-amp, typical >1 GOhm)
_comment_V_max: Maximum output voltage, V (typical ±15V supply, output swing to ±13.5V)
_comment_input_noise: Input voltage noise, V/√Hz (2.9 nV/√Hz at 10 kHz from datasheet)
_comment_input_bias_current: Input bias current, A (1 nA typical for BiFET)
_comment_offset_voltage: Input offset voltage, V (500 µV maximum from datasheet)
